channel.title: Sports on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Notes

item.title: Book: Can't Hurt Me
item.description: Author David Goggins Summary The personal story of former Navy SEAL David Goggins who overcame traumatic experiences to become a successful soldier and athlete. Takeaways Most people do not know what they are truly capable of and resist challenging themselves physically and mentally to stretch the limits of their potential. Unlocking this potential requires hard work and dedicated exposure to uncomfortable experiences and pain to “callous” the mind and become mentally strong.
